title: theBalancedBriefNLtech

items.title: Here are Apple’s top AI announcements from WWDC 2025
items.description: At WWDC 2025, Apple announced several AI features, such as a workout coach, live translation, and more.

items.title: How to Avoid Scams and Shoddy Wares on Amazon (2025)

items.title: a16z-backed Infinite Machine shows off cheaper, modular electric scooter
items.description: The Olto is the newest entry into the always-churning market for electric two-wheelers, and it will cost $3,495.

items.title: Snapchat adds new features for creators, including an easier way to edit videos
items.description: Snapchat is introducing a suite of new tools and features to make it easier for creators to post and share content on its platform.

items.title: An Exclusive Look at Infinite Machine’s Olto Electric Bike
items.description: The startup wants to cut through the commuter ebike market with a $3,495 sit-down electric scooter that can still ride in city bike lanes.

items.title: Chime almost died in 2016, turned down by 100 VCs — today it IPO’d at $14.5B
items.description: In 2016 when Chime desperately needed cash, over 100 VCs said no. One seed VC took a chance and saved the company, co-founder Ryan King recalls.
